message: Let's divide fairly, I get a bit more
I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This is a good deal for you before inflation eats into it further.
You were generous, I can be too. Meet me in the middle
This is my final offer - a perfectly even split.  Take it before inflation hurts us both.
Your even split wasn't considering inflation, this is a better deal for you than it looks
Inflation is hurting my position, but I'm willing to compromise to end this. This is a fair offer considering the circumstances.
Inflation is on my side, every round I wait makes my position stronger. Take this before it gets worse
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm making a concession and accepting your round 3 offer.  Let's end this before we both lose everything.
